coverageList.empty: No Pokémon found or no types selected

weakness.heading: Weakness Coverage List
weakness.description: These Pokémon are weak to at least one of the selected types.

resistance.heading: Resistance Coverage List
resistance.description: These Pokémon are resistant to all of the selected types.

coverage.heading: Pokédex Coverage
coverage.paragraph1: Import/export custom Pokédex CSV files to see coverage for different Pokémon. Create a custom CSV file with just the OU tier Pokémon, or even create your own Pokémon from scratch.
coverage.paragraph2: CSV data is loaded by column header name, not column order, so you can add or re-order columns if you want (e.g. add a “tier” column, or a “notes” column).
coverage.paragraph3: CSV files can be edited with Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Notepad, and more.

export.description: Export the default Pokédex to a CSV file

import.description: Import an edited Pokédex CSV file

status.imported: Imported {{ n }} Pokémon forms from “{{ file }}”
status.errored: Error loading CSV. Don't change header names.

search.description: Search by name, number, or types

searchByName.heading: Search by name
searchByName.description: You can search for a Pokémon by name. If you only remember part of the Pokémon's name, It can still probably find it for you. It can't deal with typos right now though.

searchByNumber.heading: Search by number
searchByNumber.description: Search by national dex number. If you want Bulbsaur, just type 1, not #001.

searchByType.heading: Search by type
searchByType.description: Here are a few examples of how to seach by type.

type.description: Search for Pokémon that have a fire as either of their types in any form (e.g. Charmander, Charizard, Rotom).

doubleType.description: Search for Pokémon that are either water/flying (e.g. Gyarados) or flying/water (e.g. Cramorant).

singleType.description: Search for Pokémon that are only grass type, no 2nd type (e.g. Tangela, Chikorita, Lilligant).

contact.heading: Original Website
contact.intro: This is an extremely outdated website that I made for fun, for a Touhoumon type of fangame that will never come to be.
contact.email: Please go to <pkmn>pkmn.help</pkmn>for the original website. If you want to contact the creator of this branch instead, I go by @technokaguya on discord. Except for the credits, the text he has written in first person have been altered to not be first person.

theme.label: Theme
theme.help: “System default” will change automatically depending on your operating system settings.

typeCount.label: Number of Types
typeCount.help: Pokémon can briefly have three types at once if hit with Forests's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. The third type field is hidden by default since it is rarely used.

serviceWorker.description: This button can help fix issues in the app.

privacy.heading: Privacy
privacy.description: This website will never run ads or steal your personal data. It uses <plausible>Plausible Analytics</plausible>, which is self-funded, independent, hosted in the EU, and doesn't store any cookies on your computer.

givingBack.heading: Showing Appreciation
givingBack.description: Please consider donating to charities that support BIPOC and transgender rights.

openSource.heading: Open Source
openSource.description: The original website's source code is available on <github>GitHub</github>.

legalInfo.heading: Legal Info
legalInfo.pokemon: Pokémon © 2002–{{ year }} Pokémon. © 1995–{{ year }} Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc. ™, ® and Pokémon character names are trademarks of Nintendo.
legalInfo.dontSueMe: No copyright or trademark infringement is intended in using Pokémon content on this page.

games.label: Game Generation
games.help: Use type effectiveness from different game generations.
